extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Kyle Williams 15 February 2016 CS 4300 - Artificial Intelligence Missionaries and Cannibals problem utilizing iterative deepening search

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Entry point of the program
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments

      • iterativeDeepeningSearch

        public static Node iterativeDeepeningSearch(Problem problem)
        Performs iterative deepening search until the solution to the problem is found or the tree has been exhausted of possible solutions.
        Parameters:
        problem - a structure containing information about the problem being solved
        Returns:
        the solution to the problem if found. Otherwise an error

      • depthLimitedSearch

        public static Node depthLimitedSearch(Problem problem,
                      int depth)
        Simple depth-limited search. Just calls a recursive version of itself for this project
        Parameters:
        problem - a structure containing information about the problem being solved
        depth - the current depth within the tree that is being searched
        Returns:
        the solution to the problem if one is found. Otherwise an error

      • recursiveDepthLimitedSearch

        public static Node recursiveDepthLimitedSearch(Node node,
                               Problem problem,
                               int limit)
        recursively scans every node within the tree up to the specified depth limit for a solution state. If one is found it returns the results, otherwise it returns an error and sent back to the iterative deepening search method to increase the depth for another search.
        Parameters:
        node - the current node within the tree that is being searched
        problem - a structure containing information about the problem being solved
        limit - specifies the maximum depth to search within the tree
        Returns:
        the solution to the problem if it is found. Otherwise an error.

      • makeChildNode

        public static Node makeChildNode(Node parent,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> action)
        This method represents a valid action within the state space being performed on a node to generate another valid node.
        Parameters:
        parent - The node that the child node will descend from within the tree
        action - The action that is taken on the parent node to produce the child node
        Returns:
        A child node of the parent

      • makeNode

        public static Node makeNode(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> state)
        Given a state within the state space, it will create a new node to represent that state
        Parameters:
        state - The representation of the problem held by the node
        Returns:
        A newly generated node with the given state
